text: The 22nd season of Arthur started airing on PBS Kids in the United States from May 13, 2019 to May, 16 2019. Jane Lynch guest starred on the episode "Mr. Ratburn and the Special Someone." Roman Lutterotti replaced Jacob Ursomarzo as Arthur, Ethan Pugiotto replaced Christian Distefano as D.W., and Evan Blaylock replaced Max Friedman Cole as Brain. The season originally stated to have 7 episodes, but it was later confirmed that the last three episodes are a part of the next season. Pugiotto previously voiced James in seasons 20 and 21. ==Episodes== ==References== ==External Links== Category:2019 American television seasons Category:2019 Canadian television seasons Category:2019 controversies in the United States Category:2019 in LGBT history Category:Arthur (TV series) seasons Category:LGBT-related controversies Category:LGBT-related mass media in Canada Category:LGBT-related mass media in the United States Category:Political controversies in the United States Category:Same-sex marriage in television Category:Television controversies in the United States
title: Arthur (season 22)
